description: This file defines the HomeFragment class, a UI component for an Android app that displays notes in a grid, supports searching, sorting, and navigation to editing notes.

classes.name: HomeFragment
classes.description: A fragment displaying a grid of notes with search and sort functionalities, facilitating navigation to note editing.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Initializes the fragment's view, sets up RecyclerView, search box listener, and observes the notes data.

methods.name: onCreateOptionsMenu
methods.description: Inflates the options menu for sorting actions.

methods.name: onOptionsItemSelected
methods.description: Handles menu item selections for sorting notes by title or date.
